channel.title: Abouts on Vincent Giles: Composer
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Vincent Giles: Composer

item.title: About
item.description: Vincent Giles Â» Composer & Sonic Tinkerer **You are listening to an excerpt from _Post Hoc Ergo Propter Hoc_ (2016), scroll down to switch it off. ** I was born in the green and leafy outer-eastern suburbs of Melbourne in 1985, and spent my early years in the middle of alpine forest in north-east Victoria. Now I spend my time as a composer: a tinkerer with acoustic and electronic sound in the context of concert music, electronic music, installation, and performance.
